attributes.action: Break the Brexit Deadlock by holding a referendum
attributes.additional_details: The people of this great country can not be ignored we must deliver on the referendum result, presently parliament looks incompetent and it's inability to deliver the referendum result is destroying the people's belief in the countries political system. A Vote by the people on the 3 above options to leave will resolve this issue and we can move on with brexit.
attributes.background:
Westminster is at deadlock over brexit, this is a time sensitive matter and needs resolved urgently. I suggest a VOTE for the people which will resolve this problem. 
Option One - Leave No Deal 
Option Two - Leave Theresa May's Deal 
Option Three - Leave Labour plan
